## StateMachine class

**Signature:**


|  [getPersistedState(state)](./xstate.statemachine.getpersistedstate.md) |  |  |
|  [getStateNodeById(stateId)](./xstate.statemachine.getstatenodebyid.md) |  |  |

|  [microstep(state, event, actorCtx)](./xstate.statemachine.microstep.md) |  | Determines the next state given the current <code>state</code> and <code>event</code>. Calculates a microstep. |
|  [provide(implementations)](./xstate.statemachine.provide.md) |  | Clones this state machine with the provided implementations and merges the <code>context</code> (if provided). |
|  [resolveState(state)](./xstate.statemachine.resolvestate.md) |  | <p>Resolves the given <code>state</code> to a new <code>State</code> instance relative to this machine.</p><p>This ensures that <code>.nextEvents</code> represent the correct values.</p> |
|  [resolveStateValue(stateValue, \[context\])](./xstate.statemachine.resolvestatevalue.md) |  |  |
|  [restoreState(snapshot, \_actorCtx)](./xstate.statemachine.restorestate.md) |  |  |

|  [toJSON()](./xstate.statemachine.tojson.md) |  |  |
|  [transition(state, event, actorCtx)](./xstate.statemachine.transition.md) |  | Determines the next state given the current <code>state</code> and received <code>event</code>. Calculates a full macrostep from all microsteps. |
